The Front Pub.name: The Front Pub
The Front Pub.description:
Description
What is The Front Pub?
A dapp that gives you a platform for sharing memes, news, advertisements or any other type of media. Choose from showing the world a simple link, a clickable image, a video or an iframe to your resource.
Rules are simple: Use ETH to give your publication a score. A publication with the biggest score will be shown on the front page. The longer a publication is on the front, the smaller the score becomes.
If a score of the top publication drops below a score of another one, or someone makes a new publication with a bigger score, the latter will take over. A switch will only occur after the former publication was on the front for at least 15 minutes, except for the cases where a score reaches zero before that.
The total duration on the front page is calculated by a quadratic function, where 0.05 ETH is equal to an hour and 1 ETH to a day. All publications are kept in the history, where you can see when they were shown and changes in their scores over time. Given the competitive envieronment the dapp also has a leaderboard.
The dapp is published to Ethereum Mainnet, Ropsten and Rinkeby and they all have separate histories and leaderboards.

The HODL Community.name: The HODL Community
The HODL Community.description:
Description
What is The HODL Community?
Team HODL presents an ethereum based ecosystem, including an exchange where you can buy, sell and transfer THC tokens. Additionally lending is available for staking with 1.337% daily. We also have a nice card game called Rise of Nations where you flip cards and earn ether and a gambling game where u have the chance to win 2 pots

The Illuminati.description:
Description
What is The Illuminati?
The World's Best Autonomous and Self-Sustaining Pyramid

The Jigsaw Games.description:

The Mask Society NFT.name: The Mask Society NFT
The Mask Society NFT.description:
Description
What is The Mask Society NFT?
The Mask Society DAO embodies the power of self-empowerment and action. They reveal themselves in MetaVerse with boldness, to take on today's world where anything seems possible if only you have enough courage or money for it! "We are the Mask Society! We empower you with our new identity to take action in this MetaVerse."
There are 4447 NFTs ready to be minted. So don’t miss this opportunity.
The private sale was in December. The original collectors already unlocked access to the ranks in The Mask Society DAO.
The next sale is from Jan, 31st - Feb, 1st for whitelisted members. The public sale will start on the 2nd of February!
The Mask Society DAO - Genesis will start defining the tokenomics for The Mask Society DAO after the public sale event. The ranks will be clear by then: we will know who's in for the future of the DAO - a secret society built on honorable ranks. We're defining together the rules of the Metaverse to come.
Play-to-earn game - The Mask Society is creating a game world that is fun to play and pays you back for your activity.  We are excited to announce that the development team has started building our game based on tokenomics white paper! We'll be sharing the whitepaper early on so it can be wrapped in inclusive of our community's feedback and best interest. A beta version will be ready at the end of Q2.
The Mask Society DAO ERC-20 Token - Will soon start to generate the first revenue. More benefits are coming your way - truly amazing! The token generation and new secret features for the game will allow unmatched wins.

The Mike Tyson NFT Collection.name: The Mike Tyson NFT Collection
The Mike Tyson NFT Collection.description:
Description
What is The Mike Tyson NFT Collection?
The Mike Tyson NFT Collection is a limited-edition series of NFTs that celebrates the iconic life and legacy of the Baddest Man on the Planet, Mike Tyson. Each NFT is a unique collaboration between Mike Tyson and emerging artist Cory Van Lew. With Mike providing creative oversight and mentorship in the artistic process, The Mike Tyson NFT Collection is Cory Van Lew’s reimagination and interpretation of the all-time greatest Mike Tyson moments and images.
The Mike Tyson NFT Collection Includes:
The Ultimate Mike Tyson 1-of-1 NFT (1-of-1)
The Lifetime Collection (A limited set of 10 original 1-of-1 NFTs)
The Knockout Series (A limited set of 5 original NFTs - limited to 50 editions each)
The Baddest Man on the Planet (A single collector's edition NFT with 250 editions)

The Million DeFi Homepage.name: The Million DeFi Homepage
The Million DeFi Homepage.description:
Description
What is The Million DeFi Homepage?
The Million #DeFi Homepage - Own a piece of #DeFi history! ✅
Buy your pixels. Advertise or rent them.💸

The Million Ether Homepage.name: The Million Ether Homepage
The Million Ether Homepage.description:
Description
What is The Million Ether Homepage?
A 1000x1000 pixels field, where anybody can buy, sell, rent or rent out pixels, place ads within owned or rented area. Every 10x10 pixels block is an ERC721 token. Price for 10x10 pixels block starts with $1 and doubles every 10% of pixels sold. 80% of income goes to charity.

the Oracle.name: the Oracle
the Oracle.description:
Description
What is the Oracle?
Oracle is a first of its kind utility NFT that analyses its owner's on-chain activity as well as millions of other wallets and sends market predictions (buy and sell signals) to its owner. The longer Oracle stays with its owner, the better the connection between them and the better the predictions Oracle can make. Under the hood we are using a combination of on-chain and off-chain technology.
Oracle sends trade signals about Ethereum ERC-20 token markets as well as ERC-721 (NFT) tokens including new projects available for minting. You can connect your Oracle to one or more notification channels. Currently supported channels are Telegram and Email
Each Oracle has an energy level and a rarity. Rarity defines the speed at which Oracle learns and energy defines the frequency of the predictions. There will only ever be 10,000 Oracles: 10 Unique, 100 Exceptional, 1000 Rare and 8890 Magic. Token metadata is stored on IPFS.

The Pyramid Game.name: The Pyramid Game
The Pyramid Game.description:
Description
What is The Pyramid Game?
The Pyramid Game is an Ethereum pyramid scheme originally launched in 2017. Since then, thousands of blocks have been placed by hundreds of users. Anyone can place a block in the pyramid. Blocks on the bottom layer cost 0.005 ETH. Blocks on every higher layer cost twice as much. If a block is placed on top of yours, you get half the value of that block. Fee: 0.5%

The RAPSCALLIONS.name: The RAPSCALLIONS
The RAPSCALLIONS.description:
Description
What is The RAPSCALLIONS?
Welcome To The Club The RAPSCALLIONS - RAPS The Rapscallions have been at war with the axe gang for years now. Though we don’t consider them to be a mighty adversary we can’t let our guard down. You have made the right decision by seeking recruitment from us and as such you will be tested to make sure you are cut out to be a Rapscallion. You will start as an initiate and will have to prove yourself to rise among our ranks.
The Rapscallions have very limited spots for recruitment and will not be accepting more initiates once we have recruited 10,150 members. If you want to survive out there and be respected, make sure you have atleaset 1 of the 10,150 RAPS to be amongst The Rapscallions.

The Richest Says.name: The Richest Says
The Richest Says.description:
Description
What is The Richest Says?
Pay more than the previous Richest to publish anything you want on The Richest Says website! The transaction is secure and fool-proof thanks to Ethereum Smart Contracts, and whatever you want is published directly on the Blockchain - the WebApp is only the frontend in which people can check who is The Richest and what is published on the Blockchain.

The SHILLcoin HODLcoin.name: The SHILLcoin HODLcoin
The SHILLcoin HODLcoin.description:
Description
What is The SHILLcoin HODLcoin?
The SHILLcoin HODLcoin Interconnected Token Ecosystem (SHITE) is a novel Dapp-based game built on two ERC20-compatible tokens – SHILLcoins and HODLcoins. Automated markets for both tokens are generated by their respective smart contracts. These markets continually, intelligently adjust economic incentives according to player actions, meaning the optimal strategy is constantly evolving. The ecosystem is designed as a parody of the cryptocurrency market. Players can buy SHILLcoins and become a Shill or HODLcoins and become a Hodler. For each token they hold, they accumulate rewards from other players' transaction fees. Rewards grants access to the Slush Fund and can be spent to Double Down and buy more tokens or Cash Out into Ether. Those who master the game can design their playstyle to manipulate SHITE’s automated markets to their benefit. However, they may find themselves at odds with other players seeking to mold the markets to their own ends.

The Tap Platform.name: The Tap Platform
The Tap Platform.description:
Description
What is The Tap Platform?
The Tap Platform allows gamers to transfer your in-game currency from one game to the next! Convert in-game currency and score to Tapcoins ($TTT) using the Tap Platform. Built for Unity and Unreal engine, the Tap Platform SDK allows gamers to also import Tapcoins into games to buy upgrades! 
Play steam games? Convert your in-game Steam achievements to Tapcoins and get paid to play! Play the hottest games like CS:GO, Cyberpunk, GTA V, Rocketleague, Destiny 2 and more ! 
Stake Tapcoins on the Tap Platform to earn revenue from all transactions! 
Deposit Uniswap V2 LP tokens from Tapcoins, Enjin, Mana, and Axie Infinity to earn Tapcoin Liquidity Rewards!

The Train.name: The Train
The Train.description:
Description
What is The Train?
ARE YOU READY FOR A NEVER ENDING JOURNEY? Catch the train now, it will never stops and no one can stop it because The Train is a game running on the ethereum blockchain. As a passenger you participate in every distribution from every new passenger and at all jackpots drawn every 5, 50 and 500 passenger. Jackpots up to 100 ETH

TheButton.name: TheButton
TheButton.description:
Description
What is TheButton?
This is a take on the popular Reddit experiment the button, but with a few key differences. At the core, this button is based on an Ethereum smart contract. There’s a countdown timer — when the button is pressed the timer resets (just like the original). Anyone can press the button as many times as they want, but it costs ether to press it. The last presser wins the accumulated ether as a jackpot!

TheLast.name: TheLast
TheLast.description:
Description
What is TheLast?
We have gained a lot of inspirations from the way FOMO3D runs, and created a simple, fun lottery game with lots of cool updates coming up. We guarantee you that this game is fair: the bonus pool will be fully returned to the players; we will not share the fortune to any strange token holder outside this game.

TheNextBlock.name: TheNextBlock
TheNextBlock.description:
Description
What is TheNextBlock?
The Next Block is a blockchain game, where player predicts which miner will mine his transaction. Player can place 1 bet per block. If a player predicts the correct miner, he earns 1 point. The game lasts till someone gets to 3 points, winner gets 70% of prize pool, 20% will be collected to the next prize pool. Game Rules: If player doesn’t predict the correct block miner, he will lose all points or if other player wins the prize pool all other players points reduce to 0. Players bets are collected to the prize pool plus the 20% from the previous pool. Players can skip the blocks without losing points.

Thetanuts.name: Thetanuts
Thetanuts.description:
Description
What is Thetanuts?
THETANUTS PROTOCOL HELPS PARTICIPANTS GAIN SUSTAINABLE YIELD THROUGH CRYPTO STRUCTURED PRODUCTS.

ThisOrThat.io.description:

TIBRIX.name: TIBRIX
TIBRIX.description:
Description
What is TIBRIX?
Creating and adding your own Smart Contract have never been so easy! Please visit our MVP and win 50,000 TBRX! TIBRIX is creating new, stable and scalable solutions by combining and integrating High-Frequency Trading principles with Blockchain technology. TIBRIX allows participants to exchange cryptocurrencies or exchange anything of value with Smart Contracts.

Ticketh.name: Ticketh
Ticketh.description:
Description
What is Ticketh?
Rules: - Every player can buy more than one ticket. (buy more tickets if you are not the only player) - Every player can participate in more than one lottery. - Lottery starts when first ticket is bought for the round. - The lottery duration is current block number when starting + duration blocks. - Once the current block number reaches the lottery block number only one more ticket can be submitted. - When the last ticket is submitted the lottery ends and a winner is selected. - Winner is determined by a random number and prize is received within seconds. - Prize is calculated when there is more than one participant. 10% tax is for the lottery owner. - Displayed prize includes the last entry. Randomness: Unpredictable randomness is achieved by using the Chainlink decentralized oracles.

Tides of Magic.name: Tides of Magic
Tides of Magic.description:
Description
What is Tides of Magic?
Welcome to the Tides of Magic, we are a brand new trading card game on the ethereum blockchain. We are unique in that erc721 tokens from other games can be pulled into this one and interacted with. This is a challenging hurdle but we are passionate that these types of games move blockchain in the right direction. Not only should game assets be on-chain, but they all should be able to interact with each other, regardless of the project. Join us as we make advances in blockchain and have fun while we do it.

Tigers Line.name: Tigers Line
Tigers Line.description:
Description
What is Tigers Line?
TIGERS LINE ONE LINE WORLDWIDE AUTOPOOL Fast way to make 384+ ETH with WORLDWIDE one line autopool LET’S START UNSTOPPABLE ‘TIGERSLINE’ Startup Amount : 0.1 ETH INSTANT P2P MULTI PAYMENTS Startup Amount instantly distributed according to smart contract protocols as direct income above the joined users according to Line of sponsors. SUPERFAST & PASSIVE MARKETING PLAN LEVEL 1 : 22% I.E. 0.022 ETH. LEVEL 2 : 12% I.E. 0.012 ETH. LEVEL 3 : 5% I.E 0.0005 ETH. LEVEL 4 TO 100 : 0.5% I.E 0.005 ETH.

Autopool system gives opportunity to earn passive income by worldwide growth of Unstoppable ‘Worldwide’

Tip Top Universe.name: Tip Top Universe
Tip Top Universe.description:
Description
What is Tip Top Universe?

TKN.COM.name: TKN.COM
TKN.COM.description:
Description
What is TKN.COM?
TKN.COM is a decentralized game & gambling platform based on the blockchain technology. Currently in alliance with BITGO, and TKN aims to establish itself as the world's No.1 blockchain-based gambling platform.
Cryptocurrency to play in platform:
-BItcoin
-Ethereum
-FFT
-TKNT(TKN Token)
Current active services are seven blockchain based casino games: Coinflip, Roulette, Linear Dice, Wheel classic, Wheel, Plinko Neo and Keno. More games will be on the platform soon.
Stay tuned for more exciting updates!!!

To Be A King.name: To Be A King
To Be A King.description:
Description
What is To Be A King?
“To be a King” is the first decentralized tower defense mining game with both resonance trade and daily dividend. Game mining profit and players’ invitation revenue are completely distributed by the decentralized chain, to guarantee the fairness and transparency in every procedure.

To The Moon.name: To The Moon
To The Moon.description:
Description

Discover communities from the perspective of your tokens and see holdings of people you talk with. Act as an address or grow the influence of your avatar (Non-Fungible Token) and monetize it by promoting other tokens. Build communities in a trusted and safe environment.

TOKEN BUYERS CLUB.name: TOKEN BUYERS CLUB
TOKEN BUYERS CLUB.description:
Description
What is TOKEN BUYERS CLUB?
20% ENTRY FEE DISTRIBUTED PROPORTIONALLY TO TOKEN HOLDERS. 30% WITHDRAW FEE FOR THE FIRS 6 DAYS AFTER DEPOSIT THEN IT DECREASES BY 1% PER DAY UNTIL THE MINIMUM 6% IS REACHED. Token Buyers Club (TBC) is a game based on a community of token buyers with the goal of promoting the funding of a smart contract based on the Ethereum blockchain. An algorythm regulates a complex system of fees and dividends distribution that will make users earn or lose depending on the strategy they adopt.

Token ERC20 Generate.name: Token ERC20 Generate
Token ERC20 Generate.description:
Description
What is Token ERC20 Generate?
You can create your erc20 token with one click without logging in. You can customize the name, symbol, total amount, etc

Token Fighter.name: Token Fighter
Token Fighter.description:
Description
What is Token Fighter?
Token Fighter is a multi-player NFT (Non-Fungible Token) collectible game that combines DeFi-staking mechanism to align further token holder’s participation in sustaining the future of Token Fighter’s token economy and governance.

Token Locker.name: Token Locker
Token Locker.description:
Description
What is Token Locker?
Safely keep your tokens locked for a time period of your own choosing. Prevents you from making bad decisions and selling too early. It's free to use if you respect the unlock date for withdrawal that you have chosen.

Token Tycoon : Offical Release.name: Token Tycoon : Offical Release
Token Tycoon : Offical Release.description:
Description
What is Token Tycoon : Offical Release?
From the developers of Ether Online, we present to you Token Tycoon: the first blockchain tycoon simulation game where you have to strategize everything from hiring the right talent to finding the perfect location. Increase your market value and become the wealthiest tycoon of all.

token.store ETH.name: token.store ETH
token.store ETH.description:
Description
What is token.store ETH?
Operating since 2017, token.store ETH is one of the oldest, fully trustless decentralized exchanges on the Ethereum network. All funds are held on an open smart contract (and not by the exchange), thereby eliminating many security risks faced by centralized and semi-decentralized exchanges. token.store ETH has on-chain settlement and on-chain order-matching. Any token can be traded on token.store even without a listing, through the Address Trading feature. token.store also operates a trustless exchange on the EOS network.

TokenField.name: TokenField
TokenField.description:
Description
What is TokenField?
TokenField: The Smartest Way To Earn Crypto
TokenField Token, hereinafter referred to as TF, is an ERC-20 compliant smart contract designed for deployment on the Ethereum blockchain. TF is a decentralized, fairly launched, automatically liquid, trustlessly exchangeable, interest-bearing, bond-like token.
TF is redefining DeFi by doing crypto the right way: Zero team tokens, 90% or more of presale money goes to Uniswap liquidity, Contract BURNS Uniswap LP tokens, No Admin keys. If you’re looking for the best way to earn crypto, you’re in the right place.

TokenFlip.name: TokenFlip
TokenFlip.description:
Description
What is TokenFlip?
Flip your AIX or ETH to double your tokens

TokenMaker.name: TokenMaker
TokenMaker.description:
Description
What is TokenMaker?
TokenMaker is the easiest and fastest way that based on smart contract to create your own ERC-20 or ERC-223 tokens on the Ethereum network. No programming skills required Get 100% ownership of generated tokens Custom token name, symbol and initial supply Automatic verified and published contract source code Extra safety during token transfers Supports Mainnet, Ropsten Testnet

TokenPark.name: TokenPark
TokenPark.description:
Description
What is TokenPark?
TokenPark is a block chain gambling game based on mobile phone. It supports multiple tokens to make bets creatively, such as ETH, EOS, ADA, etc. The results of the lottery are taken from the EOS block, which is open, transparent and convenient to verify. No fees, no CPU resources, is the best game to experience. TokenPark uses the whole nation to mine, and the bet will get dividends. TokenPark是一個基於手機的區塊鏈博彩遊戲，創造性的同時支持多種代幣進行投注，ETH、EOS、ADA等。開獎結果取自EOS區塊資訊，公開透明方便驗證。無需手續費、不需要CPU資源，是現時體驗最好的遊戲。 TokenPark採用全民挖礦，下注將獲得分紅代幣

Tokensender.name: Tokensender
Tokensender.description:
Description
What is Tokensender?
Tokensender offers the opportunity to do batch processing for users. By paying just one
transaction, users can send to 150 addresses at the same time. Thereby, users can pay for once
instead of paying a fee for 150 times which helps to decrease Ethereum transaction fees.

NEWTokensfarm.name: NEWTokensfarm
NEWTokensfarm.description:
Description
What is Tokensfarm?
TokensFarm is a multichain Farm-As-A-Service provider offering off-the-shelf farms that can be live within minutes. It enables crypto holders to have a one-stop shop to earn yield on staked tokens. And at the same time, it allows projects to incentivize liquidity and strengthen token and project stability, while gaining exposure to around 100k unique monthly users.
Our current products are the following:
- Staking farms: Allows projects to easily setup staking farms that reward the community for locking tokens on a dynamic APY contract. 
- LP Farms: Incentivizing community to grow liquidity, providing farms where users can stake LP tokens received after providing liquidity on DEXs. 
- Vesting contracts: Allows projects to distribute tokens automatically from a smart contract to whitelist adresses bases on pre-defined vesting rules and a release schedule. 
TokensFarm helps projects to take full advantage of dynamic APY, audited smart-contract, multi-DEX capabilities, and UI design customized for each individual project. Supporting all EVM and LP tokens from, though not limited to, the following DEXs: PancakeSwap, UniSwap, QuickSwap, BakerySwap, Pangolin, and many more.

TokenSwap.name: TokenSwap
TokenSwap.description:
Description
What is TokenSwap?
TokenSwap is a Decentralized Token Auction Platform. We hope to resolve a series of problems during the pre-sale process of Token assets, such as undisclosed auctions, excessive handling fees, centralized platforms interference, and limited access to Token auctions.

Tokenvote.name: Tokenvote
Tokenvote.description:
Description
What is Tokenvote?
Stake-weighted petitions, voting, and governance for Ethereum token communities.
